spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatches between 2D and 3D. Kitchen appears relocated (2D shows kitchen on left-middle with island; 3D shows a kitchen run at the top/upper zone) (E2). Several rooms in the left side read as bedrooms in 3D where 2D indicates kitchen/living adjacency (E2). Interior door locations along the central living/hall junction on the right side do not match the 2D plan’s door distribution/swing directions (E2/E3). Exterior window groupings on the right and top edges do not align with the 2D window positions/count (E2). Overall wing depths/room sizes on the right side appear stretched compared to the 2D proportions (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are inconsistent: 2D indicates kitchen directly adjacent to left living zone; 3D places kitchen elsewhere, breaking expected adjacencies (E2). At least one small ancillary space/bathroom cluster from the 2D (top-center and top-right wet areas) is not clearly preserved as two distinct bathrooms in 3D (E1/E2). A bedroom count/partitioning appears higher in 3D than the 2D plan suggests (possible extra bedroom/space) (E5). Wall thicknesses are visually uniform but do not reflect any plan-based variation; several doors appear embedded in locations that do not match the plan’s wall openings (E2).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not reliably map to the 2D: kitchen fixtures/island placement differs from the plan (E2). Some bedrooms/furnishings appear added or moved relative to the 2D (E2/E5). Furniture scale is generally consistent, but room-fit suggests mismatched room dimensions versus the 2D (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric view with generally good lighting and coherent materials. Camera is a standard isometric-like perspective, but not a strict orthographic/isometric match (minor perspective feel) (E6). Geometry is mostly clean; however, openings/windows/doors look simplified and contribute to plan mismatch rather than detailed fidelity.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen placement does not match the 2D plan (2D kitchen on left-middle; 3D kitchen appears in upper zone).
Several room placements on the left side appear swapped (spaces reading as bedrooms in 3D where 2D indicates kitchen/living-related rooms).
At least one of the 2D plan’s small wet-area rooms/bathroom partitions (top-center/top-right cluster) is not clearly preserved as distinct rooms in the 3D.
3D render appears to include an extra bedroom/room partitioning not supported by the 2D plan (bed count/room count likely inflated).
Interior door positions along the central living and right-side hall do not align with the 2D door openings.
Multiple door swing/orientation indications differ from the 2D plan (door leaves appear reversed or simplified).
Window placement/count on the right and upper exterior walls does not match the 2D plan’s window locations.
Room/wing proportions are distorted, especially the right-side wing depth and bedroom sizing compared to the 2D.
Non-orthographic/perspective-like isometric and simplified opening geometry reduce verification fidelity.
